roleset.name: extensive

role.descr: aspect of arg1 that is extensive (if in addition

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg1
example.text: China 's wine culture is very profound , and there is a saying " there is no feast without wine " .

example.name: both args
example.text: His role in particular as it relates to the Jewish community was profound in scope and in depth.
example.arg: His role in particular as it relates to the Jewish community

example.name: arg1
example.text: however, elevation of glutamate in the extracellular space was not seen even when-1 neuronal injury was profound [*-1].

role.descr: elaboration on the profundity conveyed by arg1

example.name: both args
example.text: Justice Harlan's statement was profound in its forecast for America.

example.name: both args
example.text: That statement was profound in its implications.
